content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":260872,"originalJapaneseLine":"（誰か突っ込んでもいいかな、あの時、コパンドンが言ったのにとか）","translatedEnglishLine":"(I wonder if someone could point it out, like when Copandon said it back then.)"},{"lineNumber":260873,"originalJapaneseLine":"そうしているうちに、飛行魔物兵が１体現れた。","translatedEnglishLine":"While doing so, a flying demon soldier appeared."},{"lineNumber":260874,"originalJapaneseLine":"ムッ、発見された","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, we've been spotted."},{"lineNumber":260875,"originalJapaneseLine":"飛行魔物兵は連絡係りだった","translatedEnglishLine":"The flying demon soldier was a messenger."},{"lineNumber":260876,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人レイからの挑戦状、魔剣カオスを持つ者だろ、俺と戦えと","translatedEnglishLine":"A challenge from Demon Ray: 'You who wield the demon sword Chaos, fight me!'"},{"lineNumber":260877,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":260878,"originalJapaneseLine":"ハイパービルの前に進む、魔軍１万は割れて道を空けた","translatedEnglishLine":"They advanced before the hyperville; the 10,000-strong demon army split and opened a path."},{"lineNumber":260879,"originalJapaneseLine":"ど真ん中で堂々と待つレイ","translatedEnglishLine":"Ray waited boldly right in the center."},{"lineNumber":260880,"originalJapaneseLine":"自信満々","translatedEnglishLine":"Full of confidence."},{"lineNumber":260881,"originalJapaneseLine":"あんた達が有名な人間の部隊だってな、やりあいたかったぜ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I heard you’re the famous human squad; I’ve been wanting to face you."},{"lineNumber":260882,"originalJapaneseLine":"あの魔人カイトを倒したと聞いているぜ、いや本当だったらすごいわ","translatedEnglishLine":"I heard you defeated that demon Kaito. If it's true, that’s impressive."},{"lineNumber":260883,"originalJapaneseLine":"こっちはか弱い人間だ、パーティで戦わせてもらうぞとカオス","translatedEnglishLine":"Chaos said, 'We’re fragile humans here, so let us fight as a party.'"},{"lineNumber":260884,"originalJapaneseLine":"いいぜとレイは堂々と受ける","translatedEnglishLine":"Ray boldly accepted, 'Fine by me.'"},{"lineNumber":260885,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞戦闘になります","translatedEnglishLine":"> Battle begins."},{"lineNumber":260886,"originalJapaneseLine":"＞時間切れ","translatedEnglishLine":"> Time’s up."},{"lineNumber":260887,"originalJapaneseLine":"やばい・・負けそうという所で、レイが攻撃を止める","translatedEnglishLine":"Oh no... just when it looked like we might lose, Ray stopped attacking."},{"lineNumber":260888,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちっ、この程度かよ、他の魔人を倒したというから期待していたが","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch, is that all? I was expecting more since you said you defeated other demons."},{"lineNumber":260889,"originalJapaneseLine":"人間相手ではやりがいのある敵がいなくてやっぱつまらんか","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s boring since there’s no worthwhile enemy against humans."},{"lineNumber":260890,"originalJapaneseLine":"とがっかりした感じ","translatedEnglishLine":"He seemed disappointed."},{"lineNumber":260891,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス、カオス、やばい・・こいつ強いぞ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, Chaos, this is bad... he's strong."},{"lineNumber":260892,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、この程度ならさっさと殺して終わしておこうかと迫るレイ","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, if it’s only this much, I’ll just kill you quickly and end this, Ray pressed on."},{"lineNumber":260893,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時、ランスははったりをかます","translatedEnglishLine":"At that time, Rance bluffed."},{"lineNumber":260894,"originalJapaneseLine":"ぐっ・・イテテ、やっぱり下痢か、くそっ、俺様が本調子でないから負けてしまいそうだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh... ouch, it’s diarrhea after all. Damn, I might lose because I’m not in top form."},{"lineNumber":260895,"originalJapaneseLine":"本調子なら絶対に勝つのに・・","translatedEnglishLine":"If I were in full form, I would definitely win..."},{"lineNumber":260896,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイ．ん・・そうなのか、ちっ、身体こわしてかなら戦いに来るなよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Ray: 'Hmm... is that so? Tch, don’t come to fight if your body’s broken.'"},{ "lineNumber":260897, "originalJapaneseLine":"つまらん、今日は見逃してやる、身体成したらもう一度勝負だ。", "translatedEnglishLine":"Boring. I'll let you go today. When you recover, we’ll fight again."}, {"lineNumber":260898,"originalJapaneseLine":"ちっ、しかたねぇな、だが後悔するなよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Tch, it can’t be helped. But don’t regret this."}, {"lineNumber":260899,"originalJapaneseLine":"下痢で本調子でない今しか俺を倒す機会は無かったのだぞ、本調子の俺はお前なんか","translatedEnglishLine":"The only chance you had to defeat me was now, while I’m not in top form because of diarrhea. The real me would..."}, {"lineNumber":260900,"originalJapaneseLine":"けちょんけちょんだぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"...beat you to a pulp."}, {"lineNumber":260901,"originalJapaneseLine":"そいつは楽しみだ","translatedEnglishLine":"That’ll be something to look forward to."}, {"lineNumber":260902,"originalJapaneseLine":"Ｍランドに戻ったランス達","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance and the others returned to M Land."}, {"lineNumber":260903,"originalJapaneseLine":"あれが魔人レイか、かなり強いな、あの電撃はうっとおしい","translatedEnglishLine":"So that’s Demon Ray. Pretty strong, and that electric shock is annoying."}, {"lineNumber":260904,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か対策を考えねば・・うむむ","translatedEnglishLine":"We need to think of a countermeasure... hmm."}, {"lineNumber":260905,"originalJapaneseLine":"ま、なんとかなるだろう、後１．２回戦えば見切れるはずだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"Well, we’ll manage. After one or two more fights, we should be able to figure him out."}, {"lineNumber":260906,"originalJapaneseLine":"負けそうになったら下痢とか言えばいいさ","translatedEnglishLine":"If it looks like we’re losing, just say we have diarrhea or something."}, {"lineNumber":260907,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・いや、同じ手段は今度は通じないと思うぞ","translatedEnglishLine":"...No, I don’t think the same trick will work next time."}, {"lineNumber":260908,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜、カチューシャのサービスでエッチしたランス","translatedEnglishLine":"At night, Rance had sex as a service from Katyusha."}, Katyusha’s hospitality repeatedly."}, {"lineNumber":260910,"originalJapaneseLine":"かなりカチューシャに気を許した様子","translatedEnglishLine":"It seemed Rance was quite comfortable with Katyusha."}, {"lineNumber":260911,"originalJapaneseLine":"人類の為に戦っているのではない、俺は俺の為に戦っているのだ。","translatedEnglishLine":"I’m not fighting for humanity, I’m fighting for myself."}, might be interesting (not mandatory, left to Mr. Onami's judgment)."}, {"lineNumber":260915,"originalJapaneseLine":"\tもしある場合は、文章として２回目の時にネタとして入れてもらいます。","translatedEnglishLine":"If so, please include it as a joke line during the second time."}, {"lineNumber":260916,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t前の子はどうしたのだとランスが聞くとカチューシャがあの子は粗相したので外しました、よりいい子を用意しましたよとか","translatedEnglishLine":"If Rance asks what happened to the previous girl, Katyusha could say she caused trouble and was replaced with a better one."}, Rance, began trusting him, and the next time they met..."}, {"lineNumber":260918,"originalJapaneseLine":"\t　ランスに手紙（ＤＸの会を信じてはいけないとか）渡そうとしたので消されたとか","translatedEnglishLine":"She tried to give Rance a letter (warning not to trust the DX organization), so she was eliminated."}, {"lineNumber":260919,"originalJapaneseLine":"その後、ランスは数日に渡ってＭランド周辺で戦ったが","translatedEnglishLine":"Afterwards, Rance fought around M Land for several days,"}, {"lineNumber":260920,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人とは接触出来なかった","translatedEnglishLine":"but was unable to make contact with the demons."}, I’m here to defeat them, after all."}, {"lineNumber":260922,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここ数字、魔人の動きは一切ないです、それ所か魔軍自体も陣地に籠もったままです","translatedEnglishLine":"According to the numbers here, there’s no demon movement at all; in fact, the demon army is holed up in their positions."}, {"lineNumber":260923,"originalJapaneseLine":"何か作戦でも考えているのでしょうか","translatedEnglishLine":"Are they perhaps planning some sort of strategy?"}, {"lineNumber":260924,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜、セシルを口説きにいくランス、だが忙しいとはぐらかされる","translatedEnglishLine":"At night, Rance tried to seduce Cecil, but she dodged him saying she was busy."}, {"lineNumber":260925,"originalJapaneseLine":"うまいはぐらかし方というより余裕が無い感じ（ユーザーには分かるくらいで、ランスには分からない","translatedEnglishLine":"It wasn’t a clever dodge so much as she seemed really overwhelmed (users would understand, but not Rance)."}, {"lineNumber":260926,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーん、セシルちゃんすっかり立ち直ったか、あの時、一気に落としておくべきだったな","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, has Cecil completely recovered? I should have taken her down all at once back then."}, {"lineNumber":260927,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス側近の誰かの補足、コパあたりがいた方がいいかな","translatedEnglishLine":"A note from one of Rance’s close aides: maybe someone like Copa should be present."}, {"lineNumber":260928,"originalJapaneseLine":"　セシルの評判は今ちょっとよくないよと","translatedEnglishLine":"Cecil’s reputation isn’t very good right now."}, {"lineNumber":260929,"originalJapaneseLine":"　自由都市連合軍の隊長だけど孤立している感じらしい","translatedEnglishLine":"She’s the captain of the Free City Allied Forces but seems isolated."}, {"lineNumber":260930,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人レイに捕まったのに無事に逃げて来れたのが怪しいと言われている、どうやって逃げてきたのか本人が言わないので","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s suspicious that she was captured by Demon Ray but escaped safely; she doesn’t say how she escaped."}, {"lineNumber":260931,"originalJapaneseLine":"　みんなより不審がっている。（理由　恥ずかしいから言えない）","translatedEnglishLine":"Everyone else is more suspicious of her. (Reason: she’s too embarrassed to admit it.)"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （誰か突っ込んでもいいかな、あの時、コパンドンが言ったのにとか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I wonder if someone could point it out, like when Copandon said it back then.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうしているうちに、飛行魔物兵が１体現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While doing so, a flying demon soldier appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ムッ、発見された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, we've been spotted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飛行魔物兵は連絡係りだった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The flying demon soldier was a messenger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイからの挑戦状、魔剣カオスを持つ者だろ、俺と戦えと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A challenge from Demon Ray: 'You who wield the demon sword Chaos, fight me!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハイパービルの前に進む、魔軍１万は割れて道を空けた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They advanced before the hyperville; the 10,000-strong demon army split and opened a path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ど真ん中で堂々と待つレイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ray waited boldly right in the center.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自信満々
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Full of confidence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんた達が有名な人間の部隊だってな、やりあいたかったぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard you’re the famous human squad; I’ve been wanting to face you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの魔人カイトを倒したと聞いているぜ、いや本当だったらすごいわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard you defeated that demon Kaito. If it's true, that’s impressive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちはか弱い人間だ、パーティで戦わせてもらうぞとカオス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos said, 'We’re fragile humans here, so let us fight as a party.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいぜとレイは堂々と受ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ray boldly accepted, 'Fine by me.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞時間切れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Time’s up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やばい・・負けそうという所で、レイが攻撃を止める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh no... just when it looked like we might lose, Ray stopped attacking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、この程度かよ、他の魔人を倒したというから期待していたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, is that all? I was expecting more since you said you defeated other demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間相手ではやりがいのある敵がいなくてやっぱつまらんか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s boring since there’s no worthwhile enemy against humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とがっかりした感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seemed disappointed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、カオス、やばい・・こいつ強いぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, Chaos, this is bad... he's strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、この程度ならさっさと殺して終わしておこうかと迫るレイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, if it’s only this much, I’ll just kill you quickly and end this, Ray pressed on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、ランスははったりをかます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, Rance bluffed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐっ・・イテテ、やっぱり下痢か、くそっ、俺様が本調子でないから負けてしまいそうだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... ouch, it’s diarrhea after all. Damn, I might lose because I’m not in top form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本調子なら絶対に勝つのに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I were in full form, I would definitely win...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイ．ん・・そうなのか、ちっ、身体こわしてかなら戦いに来るなよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ray: 'Hmm... is that so? Tch, don’t come to fight if your body’s broken.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: つまらん、今日は見逃してやる、身体成したらもう一度勝負だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boring. I'll let you go today. When you recover, we’ll fight again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、しかたねぇな、だが後悔するなよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, it can’t be helped. But don’t regret this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 下痢で本調子でない今しか俺を倒す機会は無かったのだぞ、本調子の俺はお前なんか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only chance you had to defeat me was now, while I’m not in top form because of diarrhea. The real me would...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けちょんけちょんだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...beat you to a pulp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そいつは楽しみだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’ll be something to look forward to.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランドに戻ったランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others returned to M Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれが魔人レイか、かなり強いな、あの電撃はうっとおしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that’s Demon Ray. Pretty strong, and that electric shock is annoying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か対策を考えねば・・うむむ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We need to think of a countermeasure... hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、なんとかなるだろう、後１．２回戦えば見切れるはずだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, we’ll manage. After one or two more fights, we should be able to figure him out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負けそうになったら下痢とか言えばいいさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it looks like we’re losing, just say we have diarrhea or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・いや、同じ手段は今度は通じないと思うぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...No, I don’t think the same trick will work next time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜、カチューシャのサービスでエッチしたランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At night, Rance had sex as a service from Katyusha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市に来てからもう４回目である、何度もカチューシャの接待に乗っているランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since coming to the Free City, this was already the fourth time Rance had accepted Katyusha’s hospitality repeatedly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなりカチューシャに気を許した様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seemed Rance was quite comfortable with Katyusha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の為に戦っているのではない、俺は俺の為に戦っているのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m not fighting for humanity, I’m fighting for myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが堅物の正義の味方でない事をより理解するカチューシャ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha understood even more that Rance wasn’t a stiff defender of justice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスのいない所で、カチューシャはランスを見下す、落としたも同然と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance wasn’t around, Katyusha looked down on him, thinking he was as good as hers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １回目の接待と２回目の接待、メンバー一人だけ変えれたら面白いかな（絶対では無いです　大南さん判断に任せます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we change one member between the first and second hospitality, it might be interesting (not mandatory, left to Mr. Onami's judgment).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしある場合は、文章として２回目の時にネタとして入れてもらいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If so, please include it as a joke line during the second time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前の子はどうしたのだとランスが聞くとカチューシャがあの子は粗相したので外しました、よりいい子を用意しましたよとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Rance asks what happened to the previous girl, Katyusha could say she caused trouble and was replaced with a better one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マフィア的な怖さをなんか入れれたらなぁと　実はその子、ランスに抱かれランスの事を信頼するようになり、次回あった時に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wish to add a mafia-like intimidation: that girl was taken by Rance, began trusting him, and the next time they met...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに手紙（ＤＸの会を信じてはいけないとか）渡そうとしたので消されたとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She tried to give Rance a letter (warning not to trust the DX organization), so she was eliminated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、ランスは数日に渡ってＭランド周辺で戦ったが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterwards, Rance fought around M Land for several days,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人とは接触出来なかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but was unable to make contact with the demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむむ、何故あいつら出てこない、俺様が倒しに来てやっているのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, why aren’t they coming out? I’m here to defeat them, after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ数字、魔人の動きは一切ないです、それ所か魔軍自体も陣地に籠もったままです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: According to the numbers here, there’s no demon movement at all; in fact, the demon army is holed up in their positions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か作戦でも考えているのでしょうか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are they perhaps planning some sort of strategy?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜、セシルを口説きにいくランス、だが忙しいとはぐらかされる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At night, Rance tried to seduce Cecil, but she dodged him saying she was busy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うまいはぐらかし方というより余裕が無い感じ（ユーザーには分かるくらいで、ランスには分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It wasn’t a clever dodge so much as she seemed really overwhelmed (users would understand, but not Rance).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、セシルちゃんすっかり立ち直ったか、あの時、一気に落としておくべきだったな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, has Cecil completely recovered? I should have taken her down all at once back then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス側近の誰かの補足、コパあたりがいた方がいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A note from one of Rance’s close aides: maybe someone like Copa should be present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルの評判は今ちょっとよくないよと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil’s reputation isn’t very good right now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合軍の隊長だけど孤立している感じらしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She’s the captain of the Free City Allied Forces but seems isolated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイに捕まったのに無事に逃げて来れたのが怪しいと言われている、どうやって逃げてきたのか本人が言わないので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s suspicious that she was captured by Demon Ray but escaped safely; she doesn’t say how she escaped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなより不審がっている。（理由　恥ずかしいから言えない）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone else is more suspicious of her. (Reason: she’s too embarrassed to admit it.)

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

(Reason: she’s too embarrassed to admit it.)"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （誰か突っ込んでもいいかな、あの時、コパンドンが言ったのにとか）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (I wonder if someone could point it out, like when Copandon said it back then.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうしているうちに、飛行魔物兵が１体現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: While doing so, a flying demon soldier appeared.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ムッ、発見された
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, we've been spotted.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飛行魔物兵は連絡係りだった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The flying demon soldier was a messenger.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイからの挑戦状、魔剣カオスを持つ者だろ、俺と戦えと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A challenge from Demon Ray: 'You who wield the demon sword Chaos, fight me!'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ハイパービルの前に進む、魔軍１万は割れて道を空けた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They advanced before the hyperville; the 10,000-strong demon army split and opened a path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ど真ん中で堂々と待つレイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ray waited boldly right in the center.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自信満々
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Full of confidence.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あんた達が有名な人間の部隊だってな、やりあいたかったぜ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard you’re the famous human squad; I’ve been wanting to face you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あの魔人カイトを倒したと聞いているぜ、いや本当だったらすごいわ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I heard you defeated that demon Kaito. If it's true, that’s impressive.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こっちはか弱い人間だ、パーティで戦わせてもらうぞとカオス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Chaos said, 'We’re fragile humans here, so let us fight as a party.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いいぜとレイは堂々と受ける
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ray boldly accepted, 'Fine by me.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞戦闘になります
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Battle begins.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞時間切れ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Time’s up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やばい・・負けそうという所で、レイが攻撃を止める
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh no... just when it looked like we might lose, Ray stopped attacking.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、この程度かよ、他の魔人を倒したというから期待していたが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, is that all? I was expecting more since you said you defeated other demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人間相手ではやりがいのある敵がいなくてやっぱつまらんか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s boring since there’s no worthwhile enemy against humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とがっかりした感じ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seemed disappointed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス、カオス、やばい・・こいつ強いぞ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, Chaos, this is bad... he's strong.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、この程度ならさっさと殺して終わしておこうかと迫るレイ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, if it’s only this much, I’ll just kill you quickly and end this, Ray pressed on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、ランスははったりをかます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that time, Rance bluffed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぐっ・・イテテ、やっぱり下痢か、くそっ、俺様が本調子でないから負けてしまいそうだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... ouch, it’s diarrhea after all. Damn, I might lose because I’m not in top form.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 本調子なら絶対に勝つのに・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I were in full form, I would definitely win...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: レイ．ん・・そうなのか、ちっ、身体こわしてかなら戦いに来るなよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ray: 'Hmm... is that so? Tch, don’t come to fight if your body’s broken.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: つまらん、今日は見逃してやる、身体成したらもう一度勝負だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boring. I'll let you go today. When you recover, we’ll fight again.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちっ、しかたねぇな、だが後悔するなよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Tch, it can’t be helped. But don’t regret this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 下痢で本調子でない今しか俺を倒す機会は無かったのだぞ、本調子の俺はお前なんか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The only chance you had to defeat me was now, while I’m not in top form because of diarrhea. The real me would...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: けちょんけちょんだぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...beat you to a pulp.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そいつは楽しみだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’ll be something to look forward to.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: Ｍランドに戻ったランス達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance and the others returned to M Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: あれが魔人レイか、かなり強いな、あの電撃はうっとおしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So that’s Demon Ray. Pretty strong, and that electric shock is annoying.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か対策を考えねば・・うむむ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We need to think of a countermeasure... hmm.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ま、なんとかなるだろう、後１．２回戦えば見切れるはずだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Well, we’ll manage. After one or two more fights, we should be able to figure him out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 負けそうになったら下痢とか言えばいいさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it looks like we’re losing, just say we have diarrhea or something.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・いや、同じ手段は今度は通じないと思うぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...No, I don’t think the same trick will work next time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜、カチューシャのサービスでエッチしたランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At night, Rance had sex as a service from Katyusha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市に来てからもう４回目である、何度もカチューシャの接待に乗っているランス
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since coming to the Free City, this was already the fourth time Rance had accepted Katyusha’s hospitality repeatedly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かなりカチューシャに気を許した様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It seemed Rance was quite comfortable with Katyusha.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類の為に戦っているのではない、俺は俺の為に戦っているのだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I’m not fighting for humanity, I’m fighting for myself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが堅物の正義の味方でない事をより理解するカチューシャ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Katyusha understood even more that Rance wasn’t a stiff defender of justice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスのいない所で、カチューシャはランスを見下す、落としたも同然と
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When Rance wasn’t around, Katyusha looked down on him, thinking he was as good as hers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: １回目の接待と２回目の接待、メンバー一人だけ変えれたら面白いかな（絶対では無いです　大南さん判断に任せます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If we change one member between the first and second hospitality, it might be interesting (not mandatory, left to Mr. Onami's judgment).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もしある場合は、文章として２回目の時にネタとして入れてもらいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If so, please include it as a joke line during the second time.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前の子はどうしたのだとランスが聞くとカチューシャがあの子は粗相したので外しました、よりいい子を用意しましたよとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If Rance asks what happened to the previous girl, Katyusha could say she caused trouble and was replaced with a better one.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マフィア的な怖さをなんか入れれたらなぁと　実はその子、ランスに抱かれランスの事を信頼するようになり、次回あった時に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I wish to add a mafia-like intimidation: that girl was taken by Rance, began trusting him, and the next time they met...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスに手紙（ＤＸの会を信じてはいけないとか）渡そうとしたので消されたとか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She tried to give Rance a letter (warning not to trust the DX organization), so she was eliminated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その後、ランスは数日に渡ってＭランド周辺で戦ったが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Afterwards, Rance fought around M Land for several days,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人とは接触出来なかった
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but was unable to make contact with the demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: むむむ、何故あいつら出てこない、俺様が倒しに来てやっているのに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, why aren’t they coming out? I’m here to defeat them, after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここ数字、魔人の動きは一切ないです、それ所か魔軍自体も陣地に籠もったままです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: According to the numbers here, there’s no demon movement at all; in fact, the demon army is holed up in their positions.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 何か作戦でも考えているのでしょうか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Are they perhaps planning some sort of strategy?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜、セシルを口説きにいくランス、だが忙しいとはぐらかされる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At night, Rance tried to seduce Cecil, but she dodged him saying she was busy.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うまいはぐらかし方というより余裕が無い感じ（ユーザーには分かるくらいで、ランスには分からない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It wasn’t a clever dodge so much as she seemed really overwhelmed (users would understand, but not Rance).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、セシルちゃんすっかり立ち直ったか、あの時、一気に落としておくべきだったな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, has Cecil completely recovered? I should have taken her down all at once back then.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス側近の誰かの補足、コパあたりがいた方がいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A note from one of Rance’s close aides: maybe someone like Copa should be present.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルの評判は今ちょっとよくないよと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cecil’s reputation isn’t very good right now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市連合軍の隊長だけど孤立している感じらしい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She’s the captain of the Free City Allied Forces but seems isolated.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人レイに捕まったのに無事に逃げて来れたのが怪しいと言われている、どうやって逃げてきたのか本人が言わないので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s suspicious that she was captured by Demon Ray but escaped safely; she doesn’t say how she escaped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: みんなより不審がっている。（理由　恥ずかしいから言えない）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Everyone else is more suspicious of her. (Reason: she’s too embarrassed to admit it.)
